verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to you, O <S%H7703>destroyer,<s%> While you were not <S%H7703>destroyed;<s%> And he who is <S%H898>treacherous,<s%> while [others] did not <S%H898>deal<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with him. As soon as you shall <S%H8552>finish<s%> <S%H7703>destroying,<s%> you shall be <S%H7703>destroyed;<s%> As soon as you shall <S%H5239>cease<s%> to <S%H898>deal<s%> <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> [others] shall <S%H898>deal<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with you.

O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to us; we have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for Thee. Be Thou their <S%H2220>strength<s%> every <S%H1242>morning,<s%> Our <S%H3444>salvation<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>distress.<s%>
At the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H1995>tumult<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H5074>flee;<s%> At the <S%H7427>lifting<s%> up of Thyself <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H9339>disperse.<s%>

And your <S%H7998>spoil<s%> is <S%H622>gathered<s%> [as] the <S%H2625>caterpillar<s%> <S%H625>gathers;<s%> As <S%H9069>locusts<s%> <S%H4944>rushing<s%> <S%H4944>about,<s%> men <S%H8264>rush<s%> <S%H8264>about<s%> on it.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7682>exalted,<s%> for He <S%H7931>dwells<s%> on <S%H4791>high;<s%> He has <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

And He shall be the <S%H530>stability<s%> of your <S%H6256>times,<s%> A <S%H2633>wealth<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%> The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is his <S%H214>treasure.<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> their <S%H691>brave<s%> <S%H691>men<s%> <S%H6817>cry<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets,<s%> The <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H4751>bitterly.<s%>

The <S%H4546>highways<s%> are <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> the <S%H5674>traveler<s%> has <S%H7673>ceased,<s%> He has <S%H6565>broken<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> he has <S%H3988>despised<s%> the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> He has <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2803>regard<s%> for <S%H582>man.<s%>

The <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourns<s%> and <S%H535>pines<s%> <S%H535>away,<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> is <S%H2659>shamed<s%> and <S%H7060>withers;<s%> <S%H8289>Sharon<s%> is like a <S%H6160>desert<s%> <S%H6160>plain,<s%> And <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> and <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> <S%H5287>lose<s%> [their foliage.]
<S%H6258>"Now<s%> I will <S%H6965>arise,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H6258>"Now<s%> I will be <S%H7426>exalted,<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> I will be <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up.

"You have <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H2842>chaff,<s%> you will <S%H3205>give<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to <S%H7179>stubble;<s%> My <S%H7307>breath<s%> will <S%H398>consume<s%> you like a <S%H784>fire.<s%>
"And the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> will be <S%H4955>burned<s%> to <S%H7875>lime,<s%> Like <S%H3683>cut<s%> <S%H6975>thorns<s%> which are <S%H3341>burned<s%> in the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

"You <S%H7350>who<s%> are <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H7350>away,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I have <S%H6213>done;<s%> And you <S%H7138>who<s%> are <S%H7138>near,<s%> <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> My <S%H1369>might.<s%>"

<S%H2400>Sinners<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> are <S%H6342>terrified;<s%> <S%H9564>Trembling<s%> has <S%H270>seized<s%> the <S%H2611>godless.<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> among us can <S%H1481>live<s%> with the <S%H398>consuming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> among us can <S%H1481>live<s%> with <S%H5769>continual<s%> <S%H4168>burning<s%>?"

He who <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H6666>righteously,<s%> and <S%H1696>speaks<s%> with <S%H4339>sincerity,<s%> He who <S%H3988>rejects<s%> <S%H1215>unjust<s%> <S%H4642><s%> <S%H1215>gain,<s%> And <S%H5287>shakes<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H4480>so<s%> that they <S%H8551>hold<s%> <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H7810>bribe;<s%> He who <S%H331>stops<s%> his <S%H241>ears<s%> from <S%H8085>hearing<s%> about <S%H1818>bloodshed,<s%> And <S%H9429>shuts<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H7200>looking<s%> upon <S%H9563>evil;<s%>

He will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> on the <S%H4791>heights;<s%> His <S%H4869>refuge<s%> will be the <S%H4679>impregnable<s%> <S%H5553>rock;<s%> His <S%H3899>bread<s%> will be <S%H5414>given<s%> [him;] His <S%H4325>water<s%> will be <S%H539>sure.<s%>
Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will <S%H2372>see<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%> in His <S%H3308>beauty;<s%> They will <S%H7200>behold<s%> a far-distant <S%H776>land.<s%>

Your <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on <S%H367>terror:<s%> <S%H346>"Where<s%> is he who <S%H5608>counts<s%>? <S%H346>Where<s%> is he who <S%H8254>weighs<s%>? <S%H346>Where<s%> is he who <S%H5608>counts<s%> the <S%H4026>towers<s%>?"

You will <S%H3808>no<s%> longer <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H3267>fierce<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> A <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H6012>unintelligible<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> which <S%H4480>no<s%> one <S%H8085>comprehends,<s%> Of a <S%H3932>stammering<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> which <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H998>understands.<s%>

<S%H2372>Look<s%> upon <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> of our <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>feasts;<s%> Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> an <S%H7600>undisturbed<s%> <S%H5116>habitation,<s%> A <S%H168>tent<s%> which shall not be <S%H6813>folded,<s%> Its <S%H3489>stakes<s%> shall <S%H1077>never<s%> <S%H5331><s%> be <S%H5265>pulled<s%> up <S%H1077>Nor<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of its <S%H9112>cords<s%> be <S%H5423>torn<s%> <S%H5423>apart.<s%>

But <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H117>majestic<s%> [One,] the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> shall be for us A <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H5104>rivers<s%> [and] <S%H7342>wide<s%> <S%H2975>canals,<s%> On which <S%H1077>no<s%> <S%H590>boat<s%> with <S%H7885>oars<s%> shall <S%H1980>go,<s%> And on which <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H117>mighty<s%> <S%H6716>ship<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> –
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is our <S%H8199>judge,<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is our <S%H2710>lawgiver,<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is our <S%H4428>king;<s%> He will <S%H3467>save<s%> us –

Your <S%H9112>tackle<s%> <S%H5203>hangs<s%> <S%H5203>slack;<s%> It <S%H1077>cannot<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> the <S%H3653>base<s%> of its <S%H8650>mast<s%> <S%H2388>firmly,<s%> <S%H1077>Nor<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> out the <S%H5251>sail.<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> the <S%H5706>prey<s%> of an <S%H4766>abundant<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%> will be <S%H2505>divided;<s%> The <S%H6455>lame<s%> will <S%H962>take<s%> the <S%H957>plunder.<s%>

And <S%H1077>no<s%> <S%H7934>resident<s%> will <S%H559>say,<s%> "I am <S%H2470>sick<s%>"; The <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> there will be <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> [their] <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
